name: Cat VS Carrier
description:
Hello! 👋🏻

This is my first (and maybe last 🙊 ) game developed from scratch (and for fun!).

I'm not a game developer, I'm just exploring the use of KaBoom.js (https://kaboomjs.com).

Controls:

  • Left & Right arrowkeys to move
  • Up arrowkey to jump
  • Space to shoot.

Let's play! 😸

How many cans of tuna could you eat in 30 seconds? Will you destroy the cat carriers or will they catch you?
